articles.title: "Trial Judges Increasingly Playing It Safe": Chief Justice On Bail Issue - NDTV
articles.description: Chief Justice of India D Y Chandrachud on Sunday said the trial judges prefer playing safe by not granting bail on important issues of crime when it is looked at with a degree of suspicion.
articles.content:
"You (judges) have to have a sense of robust common sense," he said (File)
